author: yperbasis
content: Hello everybody! I'm Andrew. I'm a core developer. I've been working on Turbo-Geth, and, more recently, on Silkworm, a greenfield implementation of the Ethereum protocol in C++ 17 with the Apache License. https://github.com/torquem-ch/silkworm

author: chris2_2_2
content: Hey I'm Chris I'm the CMO of Flexpool.io and a partner in Xminer (name to be changed later).
